title: Feng Dou Ba Shizi Fei
overview: When Yang Qing woke up, she was surprised to find that she had entered the body of a peasant girl from the ancient times. The peasant girl Xiaoqing was about to force herself to marry into the prince's mansion by having a marriage contract with the young prince, Mu Jinfeng. Yang Qing, however, was reluctant to marry in a hurry and so she was about to ask Mu Jinfeng for the dissolution of the marriage. But every time she tries to ask him, the residual subconscious from Xiaoqing repeatedly disrupts her and turns her actions into shows of love instead!
